item.title: A live rat sighted at Tower Hill Gardens and station, 5th October
item.description:
Rat seen at night at Tower Hill Gardens near the donut stand - ran toward the station entrance. This is metres from food sales and a major commuter/tourist hub. Needs urgent pest control.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trinity Place, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Dead animal in the carriageway or footway

item.title: Located by traffic lights opposite Carluccios cafe, heading towards Chalk Farm station, 5th October
item.description:
Road has sunk and surface uneven from lights until the next bus stop. Also one manhole ver appears raised as a result. Vehicles have been damaged due to scraping marks left on road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adelaide Road, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Five street lamps and three street signage lights are all out., 5th October
item.description:
At the Vauxhall Bridge entrance of Vauxhall Bus Station from bus stop A to stop C street lamps 6, 6B, 7, 8, 9, are all out along with the lights on signposts SG7, and SG7B.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A202, Vauxhall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Poo outside my address, 5th October
item.description:
They live at number 11 Lytcott grove the same owners allow there dog to mess outside my house, I have two small children and it went into my house. They make out they are going to clean it and end up walking away, I have it on my ring door bell
